articles.author: Saurav Mukherjee
articles.title: India lose first T20I against Zimbabwe days after lifting T20 World Cup, netizens react | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India is playing its first T20I series after lifting the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 at Barbados on 29 June by defeating South Africa.
articles.content: Young Indian cricket team, led by Shubman Gill, faced a defeat by 13 runs in the first T20I of the 5-match series while playing against Sikandar Raza-led Zimbabwe at the Harare Sports Club on Saturda… [+2085 chars]
